section.name: Prerequisites
section.p: To build Jakara Taglibs packages you need to install Maven 2.

section.name: Building
section.b: The following applies to trunk and any releases containing a pom.xml. If the release contains a build.xml, refer to the Legacy Building page.
section.p: Until we release the Parent POM, you will first need to svn checkout the taglibs-parent:
Then you should execute mvn clean install. Once you have done this you are ready to build the taglib.
Obtain your taglib, either from a source download or from svn. To build a taglib, execute mvn clean package.

section.name: Building the site
section.p: The main site is built by checking out the site/ directory:
Taglib specific sites are built by directly from that taglib.
To build either - execute mvn clean site.

section.name: Releasing
section.p: To build the tar.gz or .zip for a Taglibs release, execute mvn clean assembly:assembly.
